remarks: A subclass relationship determined by ordered triples.  Use ~ relrelss to express the antecedent in terms of the relation predicate. (Contributed by NM, 17-Dec-2008.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
statement:
ssrelrel $p |- ( A C_ ( ( _V X. _V ) X. _V ) -> ( A C_ B <-> A. x A. y A. z ( <. <. x , y >. , z >. e. A -> <. <. x , y >. , z >. e. B ) ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
